mapper.select: SELECT R.ID AS id, U1.ID AS sendUserId, U1.`NAME` AS sendUserName, I1.AVATAR_URL AS sendUserAvatarUrl, U2.ID AS acceptUserId, U2.`NAME` AS acceptUserName, I2.AVATAR_URL AS acceptUserAvatarUrl, R.CONTENT AS content, R.TIME AS time FROM T_USER AS U1,T_REPLY AS R,T_USER AS U2,T_USER_INFO AS I1,T_USER_INFO AS I2 WHERE U1.ID=R.SEND_USER_ID AND R.ACCEPT_USER_ID=U2.ID AND R.COMMENT_ID=#{commentId} AND U1.ID = I1.USER_ID AND U2.ID = I2.USER_ID ORDER BY R.TIME DESC LIMIT #{begin},#{length};
